description: Automatically check in eligible accounts every day within a configurable time window.

settings.title: Auto Check-in
settings.enableDesc: Toggle the global auto check-in feature. When disabled, no check-in tasks will run.
settings.pretriggerDailyOnUiOpen: Pre-trigger daily run when UI opens
settings.pretriggerDailyOnUiOpenDesc: When you open the extension UI during today's time window and the daily run has not executed yet, start it immediately.
settings.notifyUiOnCompletion: Refresh shows and interface upon auto check-in completion
settings.notifyUiOnCompletionDesc: When automatic check-in is completed, immediately refresh the check-in account's data and relevant interfaces.
settings.windowStartDesc: The earliest local time when the daily check-in can start.
settings.windowEndDesc: The latest local time when the daily check-in can start.
settings.scheduleModeDesc: Choose how the next run time inside the window is calculated.
settings.deterministicTimeDesc: Pick the exact time (HH:mm) to start check-in when deterministic mode is enabled.
settings.retryDesc: Automatically retry failed accounts a few times during the same day.
settings.retryIntervalDesc: How long to wait before the next retry attempt.
settings.retryMaxAttemptsDesc: Max attempts per account per day (initial + retries).
settings.viewExecutionDesc: View detailed results and logs for each automatic check-in run.

debug.triggerDailyAlarmNow: Dev: Run daily check-in now (simulate daily check-in alarm callback)
debug.triggerRetryAlarmNow: Dev: Run retry check-in now (simulate check-in retry alarm callback)
debug.scheduleDailyAlarmForToday: Dev: Schedule daily check-in alarm for later today
debug.evaluateUiOpenPretrigger: Dev: Evaluate if 'Pre-trigger today's check-in when UI opens' conditions are met
debug.triggerUiOpenPretrigger: Dev: Immediately try 'Pre-trigger today's check-in when UI opens'
debug.resetLastDailyRunDay: Dev: Clear 'Daily check-in already run today' flag
debug.uiOpenPretriggerDiagnosticsTitle: Pre-trigger today's check-in when UI opens
debug.uiOpenPretriggerDiagnosticsDesc: Shows whether conditions are met, and the input information used for judgment.

hints.invalidAccessToken: Solution: The Access Token may have expired. Please log in to the site again, then in 'Account Management â†’ Edit Account', automatically re-identify/refresh the Access Token. If this issue still occurs after automatic identification, please manually obtain and modify the Access Token.

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by account name or message...

empty.noHistoryDesc: Click "Run now" to execute automatic check-in for all eligible accounts
empty.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your filters or search query

snapshot.title: Account readiness
snapshot.description: Every detection-enabled account is listed below so you can see why it might be skipped before the next run.
snapshot.emptyDesc: Enable check-in detection for at least one account to see eligibility diagnostics.

skipReasons.no_provider: The account's site type currently does not support check-in
skipReasons.provider_not_ready: Account configuration currently does not support check-in

providerFallback.endpointNotSupported: This check-in endpoint is not supported. Please check if your account's site type is the same as the actual site.

error.loadFailed: Failed to load auto check-in settings: {{error}}
error.dailyAlarmScheduleForTodayFailed: Failed to schedule daily alarm for today: {{error}}
error.lastDailyRunDayResetFailed: Failed to reset last daily marker: {{error}}
error.openManualFailed: Failed to open manual sign-in page: {{error}}
error.invalidTimeWindow: Invalid time window. Start and end cannot be the same.
error.invalidDeterministicTime: Please provide a valid deterministic time in HH:mm format.
error.deterministicTimeOutsideWindow: The deterministic time must fall within the configured window.
error.invalidNumber: Please enter a valid positive number.

success.settingsSaved: Auto check-in settings have been saved.

uiOpenPretrigger.dialogDescription: Today's scheduled daily run was triggered early when the UI opened.
